channel.title: Please can someone help just look please
channel.description: Okay this might be too much of a question but basiclly here is what im doing -.-..... Im adding dungeoneering on my server instead of farming i got everything worked out but i need to ask you guys how can i make it so that i could get dungeoneering xp for killing a monster? if you know please reply i will rep+

item.title: Please can someone help just look please

item.description:

Ah, you gave in.

Read full topic

item.title: Please can someone help just look please
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

I suggest either ripping the Barrows code used for when killing an Barrow’s NPC it gives you kills +1 to Dungeoneering NPC addSkillXP(21, 50);

Also make a “isDungeoneeringNPC” array. This is all I can suggest, there may be a better way to do this and someone may be able to step-by-step guide you. Have a play around, and don’t forget to backup your files first.

Read full topic

item.title: Please can someone help just look please
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

I would say rename everything that is Farming to Dungeoneering, and delete growing plants to your dungeoneering code. Also, to edit the skill menu…

Farming XP: 0
Next Level At: 13,000,000 (…)

…you’ll need to edit the cache.

Read full topic
